title: Feel the burn mission
body:
As a team defeat elder dragon .

What if i couldn't do it ? Like the rates to get an elder in a game is less than before . We barley find time to play so what is this stupid kind of mission ?

At Least give the players another option that can be done ?

Hello Riot ?? Why making missions more grindy ?
I wouldn't say a thing if it was with the same old drake system but now it is way harder . 
Just 4 element drakes can end the game before even an elder shows up.
Spawning elder require hell of effort in a normal match .
